name: Peppermill Deluxe Remodeled King Room
description: Peppermill Tower's newest room type, the Deluxe Remodeled King features innovative amenities paired with a posh contemporary design. Airy quartz countertops set against luxe dark birch furnishings create a bold foundation with stylish artwork and designer carpeting. A modern upgrade on the Peppermill standard.
shortDescription: Peppermill's newest room — contemporary design with quartz countertops and dark birch furnishings.

faqs.question: What's new about the Remodeled King Room?
faqs.answer: Quartz countertops, dark birch furnishings, designer carpeting, and contemporary artwork — Peppermill's most modern room design.

faqs.question: How does it compare to the standard Deluxe King?
faqs.answer: The Remodeled King is the newest room type in the Peppermill Tower with a contemporary aesthetic upgrade.

testimonials.quote: The remodeled rooms at Peppermill are sharp. Modern design, great bed, and it felt brand new. Perfect for our golf trip.
testimonials.author: Jason K.

testimonials.quote: Stayed in the remodeled king and it was really impressive — very contemporary and clean. GTHS recommended it and they were right.
testimonials.author: Nathan S.
